import pygame
import sys

WIDTH, HEIGHT = 500,500
WIN = pygame.display.set_mode((WIDTH, HEIGHT))
i = 0
while True:
    for e in pygame.event.get():
        if e.type == pygame.QUIT:
            pygame.quit()
            sys.exit()
    print("Hello World ", i)
    pygame.display.update()
    i+=1
